Online safety: Children may be exposed to inappropriate content or cyberbullying, which can lead to emotional distress and a lack of privacy.
Addiction: Children may become addicted to digital devices and develop compulsive behaviors, such as gaming or social media use, which can interfere with their daily lives and relationships.
Impact on academic performance: Excessive screen time and digital distractions can negatively affect a child's academic performance, as they may have difficulty focusing on their studies.
Impact on physical health: Sedentary behavior associated with excessive screen time can lead to a sedentary lifestyle, which can increase the risk of obesity and other health problems.
Impact on social skills: Children who spend too much time using digital devices may have difficulty developing social skills, as they may have fewer opportunities for face-to-face interactions.
